info.title: Dummy, Inc. API
info.description: An API for accessing Dummy, Inc.

get.summary: Retrieve a user. Can only be called for the current user.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: If "current" is specified, retrieves the currently authenticated user. Otherwise must be a .NET Guid.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Specify details to include about this user.

get.summary: Retrieve a user. Can only be called for the current user.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: If "current" is specified, retrieves the currently authenticated user. Otherwise must be a .NET Guid.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Specify details to include about this user.

put.summary:
Merge the user specified by sourceUsername into the current user.
            The source user must be an anonymous user.

Change the password of the specified user.
            Currently only supported for use on the currently authenticated user.
Saves or updates current user's answer to a question.

parameters.name: userAnswer
parameters.description: The answer to save or update.

head.summary: Checks to see if the API is alive and reachable.

get.summary: This will return a flat structure of all the questions and answers.

parameters.name: siteID
parameters.description: The ID of the requested site.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The group(s) of requested questions and answers.

get.summary: Gets the list of available time zones.

This method will be the exposed web api method to access student assignments and it will call methods for specific 
            assignment filtering based on the parameters from the client.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Allows filtering assignments based on status (Upcoming / Past Due)

get.summary:
This method will be the exposed web api method to access student assignments in a course
            and it will call methods for specific assignment filtering based on the parameters from the client.

post.summary: Log an error that occurs on the client side.

Validate a receipt with its provider and then apply it to the current user.
            Currently supports receipts of type "Dummy, Inc..iTunesReceipt" and "Dummy, Inc..GooglePlayReceipt"

get.summary: Retrieve a billing agreement

post.summary: Create (initiate) a billing agreement. The agreement will then need to be accepted before it can be used in a purchase.

parameters.name: agreement
parameters.description: Parameters for the new agreement

post.summary:
Validate a receipt with its provider and then apply it to the current user.
            Currently supports receipts of type "Dummy, Inc..iTunesReceipt" and "Dummy, Inc..GooglePlayReceipt"

Purchase the specified product and apply the purchase to the specified user.
            Currently only free products (i.e. trials) are supported.

parameters.name: purchase
parameters.description: Completed template of the purchase.

get.summary: Callback from the payment provider after the user has accepted / rejected a new billing agreement.

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: nonce
parameters.description: Nonce obtained when the agreement was initiated

parameters.name: accepted
parameters.description: Flag indicating whether the user accepted the agreement

get.summary: Load book profile (header / metadata and TOC) by book ID.

parameters.name: bookID
parameters.description: book ID

get.summary: Load book page (text of page, display page number, etc.) by page ID

parameters.name: pageID
parameters.description: page ID

get.summary: Load book page (text of page, display page number, etc.) by book ID and display page number

parameters.name: bookID
parameters.description: book ID

parameters.name: pageNumber
parameters.description: display page number

get.summary: Load article text and header information

parameters.name: documentID
parameters.description: DocumentID

post.summary: Track item currently viewed by user

get.summary: Searches for content matching the specified input criteria.
Searches for content matching the specified input criteria.
Searches for content related to the specified input document.
Looks up publications by an ID or a partial name.
Returns most recently viewed content matching the specified input criteria.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: UserId of user whose recently viewed content has been requested.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of recently viewed content items which have been requested. Max 20.

get.summary: Retrieves a random list of topics.
Creates a bibliography.

parameters.name: citationType
parameters.description: The type of citation used when making the bibliography.

get.summary: Gets all the user's projects.
Gets user's project.

parameters.name: workspaceID
parameters.description: Project ID

get.summary: Gets the user's active project.
Get a list of items for the active project.
Get a list of items for the specified project.

delete.summary: Delete an item from the specified user project

parameters.name: itemID
parameters.description: The ID of the item to delete.

post.summary: Create a saved bookshelf item, such as a saved book or article.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The new bookshelf item

post.summary: Create a saved bookshelf item, such as a saved book or article.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The new bookshelf item

parameters.name: projectItemID
parameters.description: The ID of the item you are updating

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: the item you are updating

parameters.name: projectItemID
parameters.description: The ID of the item you are updating

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: the item you are updating

get.summary: Exports the specified project items into a format specified by the request's accept header.

parameters.name: projectItemID
parameters.description: The ID of the project items to export.

get.summary: Get a list of items from all projects.

delete.summary: Delete an item from the specified user project

parameters.name: itemID
parameters.description: The ID of the item to delete.

get.summary: Exports the specified project item fields into a format specified by the request's accept header.

parameters.name: projectItemID
parameters.description: The ID of the project item to export.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the fields on the project item to export.

parameters.name: bibliographyID
parameters.description: An optional bibliography to append to the end of the export.

post.summary: Associate a WorkSpaceItem to a ResearchPaper

delete.summary: Unassociate a WorkSpaceItem to a ResearchPaper

User.description: Represents a user of the application.

IsLegacyUserName.description: Flag to indicate is the user's Email and UserName are not equal

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

UserPreferenceQuestion.description: Information about a single question and answer.

Group.description: The group the question belongs to.

FreeText.description: The free-form text of the answer if there is no ID.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

Relation.description: The RFC 5988 standard link relation type.

HREF.description: The hypertext reference of the link.

Method.description: The available HTTP verbs that can be used with the link.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

PasswordChange.description: Represents the parameters necessary for a user to change their own password.

AnswerID.description: The ID of the selected answer, if multiple choice.

FreeText.description: The text of the answer, if free-form.

Group.description: The type of question; does not apply to answers.

ParentID.description: The unique key of this record's parent.

ID.description: The unique key of this record.

Type.description: The display type of the question; does not apply to answers.

Category.description: The category of the answer; does not apply to questions.

DefaultAnswer.description: Flag indicating if this is the default answer for its parent question; does not apply to questions.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

Text.description: The display-friendly name of the time zone.

Abbreviation.description: The abbreviation of the time zone.

IsDefault.description: If the time zone is the system default.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

Receipt.description: Represents a receipt. Provides verifiable evidence that an item was paid for via an external store.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

RedirectUrl.description: Url to which the user should be redirected in order to accept or reject the agreement.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

BillingAgreementTemplate.description: Template for creating a new BillingAgreement

CustomerID.description: ID of the customer, if one exists.

ProductID.description: ID of the initial product that will be purchased.

PaymentMethod.description: Template of new PaymentMethod to be created.

RedirectUrl.description: Url to which the user should be redirected after the billing agreement is accepted or rejected.

PurchaseTemplate.description: Template for creating a new Purchase

PortalID.description: Portal that is performing the purchase. Required.

ProductIDs.description: ID of the product that will be purchased. Required.

CustomerID.description:
Specifies the existing customer who is making the purchase.
            This field must be populated if the purchase is for an existing customer.

UserID.description:
Specifies the User for whom the purchase is being made.
            This field should be populated if the purchase is being made by a new customer.

PromotionCode.description: Promotion code to apply to the order (optional)

NormalizedTerm.description: A term in both its unmodified and normalized form.

Display.description: The unmodified value, suitable for display.

Normalized.description: The normalized value with punctuation / accents removed, suitable for searching.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

LibrarySearch.description: A set of input criteria used to perform a document search.

LibraryItemType.description: Filters on content type; periodicals, books and topics cannot be mixed in a single request.

BookID.description: Optionally limits searches to a single book. Ignored if LibraryItemType is not set to Book.

Title.description: Filters on the title of the document.

TitleMode.description: Controls how multiple words in the title filter are handled.

Contributor.description: Filters on the author/contributor of the document.

ContributorMode.description: Controls how multiple words in the author/contributor filter are handled.

Subject.description: Filters on the subject of the document.

SubjectMode.description: Controls how multiple words in the subject filter are handled.

Publisher.description: Filters on the publisher of book results.

PublisherMode.description: Controls how multiple words in the book publisher filter are handled.

PublicationID.description: Filters on the publication ID of periodicals.

PublicationName.description: Filters on the publication name of periodicals.

PublicationDateStart.description: Constrains the publication start date of search results.

PublicationDateEnd.description: Constrains the publication end date of search results.

PeerReviewedType.description: Flag indicating what peer-reviewed statuses to search on.

IncludeFreePublicationsOnly.description: Limits search results to only those publications without payment restrictions.

PageNumber.description: Controls what page number to select when paging search results.

PageSize.description: Controls what page size to use when paging search results.

LibrarySearchResults.description: A collection of document search results.

ItemsCount.description: The number of matching items in this page of search results.

ItemsTotal.description: The total number of matching items in the search results.

Items.description: The items in this page of search results.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

LibrarySearchResult.description: A search result representing a single document.

LibraryItemType.description: The type of the document represented by this search result.

Contributors.description: A list of the authors/contributors to the document.

ContributorsDetailed.description: A list of the authors/contributors to the document.

PublicationID.description: The ID of the publication putting out this document.

PublicationName.description: The publication putting out this document.

Publisher.description: The publisher that published this document.

PublisherDetailed.description: The publisher that published this document.

PublicationDate.description: The date this document was published.

Period.description: The publication period of this document.

Subjects.description: A list of the subjects this document involves.

SubjectsDetailed.description: A list of the subjects this document involves.

Teaser.description: A short teaser of the text of this document.

IsPeerReviewed.description: Flag indicating if the document has been peer-reviewed.

AccessType.description: The payment level of this document.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

LibrarySearchSummary.description: A set of input criteria used to perform a document search summary.

LibraryItemType.description: Type of content to get a summary of.

LibrarySearchSummaryResults.description: A summary of all library item types' search results.

Items.description: A list of library item search summaries.

TotalItemCount.description: The total number of matching library items.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

LibrarySearchSummaryResult.description: A summary of a single library item type's search results.

ItemCount.description: The number of matching library items.

MaltSearch.description: The input criteria required to perform a MALT search.

ContentID.description: The ID of the content to perform a MALT search on.

ContentType.description: The type of the content to perform a MALT search on.

LibraryItemType.description: The type of content to be represented in the search results.

PublicationSearch.description: The input criteria required to perform a Publication search.

ID.description: The IDs of publications to look up.

Count.description: The number of results to return.

IsPeerReviewed.description: Flag indicating if the publication is peer-reviewed.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

RecentlyViewedContentItem.description: A library item that has recently been viewed.

UserID.description: The UserId of the user interacting with this content.

LibraryItemType.description: The type of the document represented by this search result.

Contributors.description: A list of the authors/contributors to the document.

ContributorsDetailed.description: A list of the authors/contributors to the document.

PublicationID.description: The ID of the publication putting out this document.

PublicationName.description: The publication putting out this document.

Publisher.description: The publisher that published this document.

PublisherDetailed.description: The publisher that published this document.

PublicationDate.description: The date this document was published.

Period.description: The publication period of this document.

Subjects.description: A list of the subjects this document involves.

SubjectsDetailed.description: A list of the subjects this document involves.

Teaser.description: A short teaser of the text of this document.

IsPeerReviewed.description: Flag indicating if the document has been peer-reviewed.

AccessType.description: The payment level of this document.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

Category.description: A grouping of topics and other categories in Dummy, Inc.'s library.

TopicCount.description: The number of research topics contained in this category.

ItemType.description: Whether this item is a general category or research topic.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

TopicRandomizer.description: Parameters controlling the pool of topics to choose from.

CategoryID.description: The (optional) parent category to pull topics from.

ExcludeID.description: A list of topics to exclude from the result pool.

Topic.description: A research topic consisting of a summary and list of related topics, articles and books.

Essay.description: An essay describing or explaining the topic.

RelatedTopic.description: A list of topics related to this topic.

ReadingMaterial.description: A curated list of articles and books related to this topic.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

Contributor.description: A list of people who contributed to this item.

PublicationDate.description: The date this document was published.

AccessLevel.description: The user's current level of access to this item.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

BibliographyIDs.description: A collection of CitationIDs to make a bibliography from.

CitationIDs.description: A set of input criteria used to perform a document citation.

PageNumber.description: The number of a page in a book.

PageID.description: The ID of a book page.

URL.description: The URL where this document can be retrieved.

Bibliography.description: The bibliography of a list of documents.

Type.description: The style represented by the bibliography.

Heading.description: The heading text of the bibliography.

ItemIDs.description: A combined listing of the item IDs that make up the bibliography.

Value.description: The complete bibliography made up of individual items.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

PageNumber.description: The number of a page in a book.

PageID.description: The ID of a book page.

WorkspaceSearch.description: A set of input criteria used to perform a workspace search.

WorkspaceID.description: Constrains results to a specific workspaces ID.

ContentID.description: Constrains results to a specific content ID.

PageID.description: Constrains results to a specific page ID.

ItemType.description: Constrains results to a list of item types.

PageNumber.description: Controls what page number to select when paging search results.

PageSize.description: Controls what page size to use when paging search results.

Domain.description: Constrains results to a specific website domain.

HasSourceMetaData.description: Constrains results to items with source metadata.

WorkspaceSearchResults.description: A collection of workspace search results.

ItemsCount.description: The number of matching items in this page of project results.

ItemsTotal.description: The total number of matching items in the project results.

Items.description: The items in this page of project results.

MetaData.description: A collection of key-value data points.

Links.description: A collection of related resource links.

PublicationLocation.description:
MLA: City only.

APA: City and state abbreviation; city and country name for non-U.S.

Chicago: City only if well-known; otherwise city and abbreviated state, province, or country.
PublicationLocation.title: Publication location

Doi.description: The Digital Object Identifier is an alphanumeric key given to a document that is a permanent way of identifying that document if its URL changes or ceases to exist. It is most commonly used for web-based and electronic documents.
Doi.title: DOI (URL if DOI is unavailable)
